Name: Tough Law
About the game: 1995, JF city, which until then was a city of peace, was taken over by organized crime. The police chief began investigating criminal organizations and disappeared after going to a bar to interrogate suspects. Tommy Malloy is his friend and a Tough cop that will do anything to find him, no matter how difficult it is or whoever he has to face. Tough Law is an beat n up game where we can face whoever to find our desapeared friend. Keep them down! Face these crazy enemies! Go fot it! Block attacks Escape from them! Featuring: Handcrafted graphics with paperboard style. Great fights against crazy enemies! Originally composed rock soundtrack; Big combats with powerful combos and attacks Face powerfull bosses!
